text: Shinko suru mono yo, moshi anata gata no naka kara oshie ni somuki saru mono ga areba, yagate arra wa,-min o mede rare, kare-ra mo omo o keiai suru yona soto no min o tsurete ko rarerudearou. Kare-ra wa shinja ni tai shite wa kenkyodearuga, fushinjin-sha ni taishite wa ishikengo de chikaradzuyoku, arra no michi no tame ni funto doryoku shi, hinan-sha no waru ro o kesshite osorenai. Kore wa, arra ga o konomi ni nara reta mono ni atae rareru onkeidearu. Arra wa atsu Shi ni shite zenchi de ara reru
